This is a quality control pipeline for publicly available hapmap data available [here](ftp://ftp.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/hapmap/genotypes/hapmap3/plink_format/draft_2). 

This will be done using [workflowr](https://github.com/jdblischak/workflowr) to analyze and perform the various steps involved.
